entry.title: Zensa Healing Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zensa
Type: Zensa
Price: 75.00

Zensa Healing Cream - 237ML
Clinically proven to reduce itching, minimize scarring, treat skin conditions and promote easy recovery post-procedure.


what's included

  • Vegan, steroid- and cruelty-free relief for skin conditions like eczema
  • Formulated with medicinal-grade and all natural ingredients. Calendula and grapefruit oil are proven to reduce irritation and speed up the healing
  • Shea butter and cucumber extract soothe and hydrate the skin
  • Includes sunflower seed oil to brighten your tattoo and preserve its original colour
  • Will not impede ink settling

Ingredients:

Medicinal Ingredients (per dose unit): Calendula (Calendula Officinalis, Flower 4% (1:4, QCE 1 Grams), Grapefruit Essential Oil (Citrus Paradisi, Fruit Peel) 2%.
Non-Medicinal Ingredients: Aqua, Sunflower Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Persea Americana (Avocado) Oil, Ceteareth-12, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, D-Alpha Tocopherol, Shea Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Green Tea Extract, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexl Palmitrate.

How to Apply

Apply healing cream twice daily to the affected area until symptoms resolve.

entry.title: Mina Thread
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type: Brow Thread
Price: 9.00

Mina Thread is used to remove excess brow hair from the area and unwanted facial hair. It is made of cotton, grown and harvested without the use of any pesticides, herbicides, insecticides, chemical fertilizers or any other chemicals, on land that has been chemically free for at least 3 years. This ensures the production of cotton that is not only environment friendly but is skin-friendly also, making it suitable for use on the most sensitive skin types.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Mina Thread is intended for professional use and for this reason the professional use and for this reason, the professional using this product must be familiar with at least one facial hair removal technique. Prior to use, it is necessary to wash the hands and facial area using Mina Henna.

Net Qty.: 300meter

entry.title: Mina White Brow Paste and Barrier
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type:
Price: 13.30

Mina White Brow Paste is the secret professional brow artists use to get picture-perfect eyebrows with a defined shape and the desired look. Outline the brows with this thick white paste, or sketch the right shape of the eyebrows visible to you & the client that helps to perfect your brow tinting.

The paste also assists to avoid stains and smudges on the skin.

Application Accessories:

Angled Brow Brush - use a flat edge to create a barrier around the precise area you want to work with. Remove after with cotton rounds

Threading Thread - place a small amount of paste onto a flat sterile surface and roll threading thread in the paste. Use the thread to make temporary guidelines for microblading, permanent makeup, or henna treatments

INGREDIENTS: Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclomethicone, Stearyl Dimethicone, Silica Tocopheryl acetate, Carnauba wax, Beeswax, May Contain: Titanium dioxide CI 77891

Net Qty.: 5g

Online Instructions: https://www.ibrowhenna.com/pages/how-to-use

entry.title: Brow Soap
entry.summary:
Vendor: Miss Pretty
Type: Brow Soap
Price: 9.25

Brows are in! Try a little styling with a mascara wand and our Styling Brow Soap. Excellent to cover up sparse areas, create a spiked or messy look, or combine with a brow lamination. The possibilities are endless!

Includes:

  • Tin with sliding lid
  • One brush


Directions:

  • Spray brush with a little water and shake off excess
  • Dip your brow brush into brow soap to lightly cover the bristles
  • Brush your brows a small piece at a time into the desired look
  • Don't be afraid to flick a few upwards for a natural tousled look
  • Leave on to dry

Ingredients:

Water, sucrose, stearic acid, sorbitol lauric acid, palm oil, coconut oil, olive oil, ethanol, propylene glycol, glycerin, sodium hydroxide, laurel Sodium Alchohol Sulfate, Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl sulphate, acrylate copolymer, hamamelis Virginiana extract

 *Wholesale pricing available when you login as wholesale*

Apply Here: Wholesale Account Application

entry.title: Curl Five™ Express Lash Lift and Brow Lamination
entry.summary:
Vendor: StarColor New
Type: Dolly Lash Lift
Price: 74.99

Curl Five™ Lash Lift, by Lashes By Design, is the hottest Lash Lift trend in the Eyelash industry.  Compared to leading lash lift products, the Curl Five Lash Lift procedure will save almost 30 minutes off the service!  Each starter kit has enough product to do approximately 10 clients when using 2 pumps per client. 

Lashes will stay lifted and keep their curl, even after swimming or showering, for up to 12 weeks.  For best results, offer re-curls every 6 weeks, depending on the speed of your client's lash growth cycle.

Why Choose a Pump?

With Airless Pump Technology, the lash lift products will stay fresh for up to 1 year after opening. Here are some of the benefits:

  • No more sealing or wasting sachets
  • No more messy sachets in ziplock bags!
  • Only use EXACTLY what you need for each client
  • Product stays fresh as the day you opened it
  • Less packaging and waste
  • Easier to Store

Benefits:

  • 5 minute per solution saves you time
  • no waste single-use sachets
  • hygIenic
  • the product lasts for 2 years unopened
  • Makes natural eyelashes appear longer without the use of eyelash extensions
  • Lashes stay lifted 6-8 weeks
  • No damage to the natural eyelashes
  • Faster application techniques saving you time
  • Clients can swim, shower and play with no fuss, no aftercare
  • Suitable for short & long eyelashes
  • Allows for perfect positioning of lashes
  • Formaldehyde-free

Full Starter Kit includes:

  1. Lift Lotion #1 Pump (5 ml)
  2. Set Lotion #2 Pump (5 ml) Sodium Bromide Free
  3. NOURISH Lotion #3 Pump (5 ml)
  4. Extra Strong Curl Five Lash Lift Adhesive x 1 bottle 
  5. Silicone Shields (5 mixed sizes)
Directions for Lash Lift and Brow Lamination use:
Apply silicone pads to the upper eyelid with water-based lash lift adhesive. (Lash Lift only)

Comb lashes onto the silicone pad. (Lash Lift Only)

Apply step 1 generously from the base of the lash. Wipe off any solution from the tips of the lashes. Set the timer for at least 5-7 minutes per eye as soon as you apply lotion. Thicker lashes will take 7 minutes. 

Remove any excess solution from step one with a lint-free applicator. Add Step #2 SET using the same timer settings as step 1.

Remove the excess solution from Step #2 SET with a lint-free applicator.

Apply either tint for 5 minutes
Apply Step #3 NOURISH solution for 5 minutes.
Remove pads and clean with a slightly damp cotton round

Ingredients:
Step #1 LIFT: Water, Ethanolamine, Thioglycolic Acid, 1-Hexadecanol, Polyquaternium-28, Steartrimonium Chloride, C12-15 Pareth-10, Glycerin, Glyceryl Monostearate, perfume, ethylenediaminetetraacetic Acid Disodium salt
Step #2 SET: Water, 1-Hexadecanol, Peroxide, Steartrimonium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Disodium Phosphate
Step #3 NOURISH: Propylene Glycol, Methylparaben, Polysorbate, Collagen, Purified Water
*caution* Health Canada has added Sodium Bromate to their banned substance list. This impacts ALL brands of lash lift products. Check the ingredients to make sure you are always purchasing Sodium Bromate Free solutions.

entry.title: Refectocil Tint
entry.summary:
Vendor: natali
Type: tint
Price: 16.07

RefectoCil Tint will result in deep, full and even more intense than ever before and so the lashes appear visibly longer and more voluminous. The tint is absolutely smudge and waterproof and lasts up to 6 weeks.

With RefectoCil you will always achieve a beautiful, long-lasting and intensive tinting result of eyelashes and eyebrows. What else you need to know: Tinted eyelashes appear clearly denser, as the tinting accentuates the full length of the lashes faded by sun and water. The tint highlights and lengthens short lashes; it adds gloss and shine to dull hairs and freshens already greying lashes and brows. Tinted eyebrows appear nicely defined and more colour intensive. Your eyes appear livelier and expressive, even without make-up. The best result is achieved when applying the tint regularly because with each tinting the colour will penetrate deeply into the eyelashes leaving them more intensely and longer-lasting coloured.

We now offer Blonde Bleaching paste which can be used to lift color or just to lighten any natural color.

PROFESSIONAL USE ONLY

entry.title: Henna Brow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mina
Type:
Price: 21.00

We recommend picking a shade lighter than your client's natural colour

Quick Overview

  • Gives spot colouring with tattoo effects
  • Is capable of depositing only permanent colours
  • Efficiently gives a beautiful coverage to resistant gray hairs.
  • Safer to use without any dangerous chemical presences like lead or ammonia.
  • Helps in rich, strong coloration of eyebrows
  • Can tint 25 to 30 brow sets.
Product Description

The Mina Ibrow Henna is designed to give your eyebrows a better and longer lasting coverage. It has a sharper effect than the usual eyebrow pencils and is definitely more effective in giving your eyebrows a deep coloration.

Includes:

  • It includes 3 sachets of ibrow henna.
  • 1 measuring cup
  • 1 spatula, 1 bottle to keep leftover ibrow henna
  • Instruction leaflet
How to prepare:

Mix your ibrow henna with water in the given cup and mix it well till it becomes a thick paste. Apply it over your eyebrow hair and leave it for 15 to 20 minutes. After this rinse it off with cold water.

Online Instructions: https://www.ibrowhenna.com/pages/how-to-use

Description:

The Mina Brow Nourishing oil is a natural product that gives nourishment to your eyebrows. This makes your eyebrows fuller. It not only makes them look beautiful but also make your eyebrows strong by strengthening them. The essential oils like Almond oil, castor oil, Argan oil, Rosemary oil and geranium oil gives your eyebrows the entire amount of nourishment it requires. Castor oil promotes the growth of your eyebrows and preserves their shape for a long time. For best results can be used at night time as the oil will stay for a longer period while sleeping and will be more effective. Apply this daily and get your desired eyebrows.
